metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

properties.serializedData:
{"version":"Notebook/1.0","items":[{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"009c874d-2354-4245-9f61-fed224a8d21d","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"User","type":1,"value":"JVR4J\administrator"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"20","name":"parameters - 0"},{"type":9,"content":{"version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","parameters":[{"id":"3d49f8df-72a2-4379-88f3-1f6b36667306","version":"KqlParameterItem/1.0","name":"TimeRange","label":"Time Range","type":4,"isRequired":true,"typeSettings":{"selectableValues":[{"durationMs":300000},{"durationMs":900000},{"durationMs":1800000},{"durationMs":3600000},{"durationMs":14400000},{"durationMs":43200000},{"durationMs":86400000},{"durationMs":172800000},{"durationMs":259200000},{"durationMs":604800000},{"durationMs":1209600000},{"durationMs":2419200000},{"durationMs":2592000000},{"durationMs":5184000000},{"durationMs":7776000000}]},"timeContext":{"durationMs":86400000},"value":{"durationMs":1209600000}}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"customWidth":"20","name":"parameters - 1"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL
| where SessionUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    SessionUser = tostring(make_set(SessionUser_s, 10)),
    SessionProtocols = tostring(make_set(SessionProtocol_s, 10)),
    SessionCount = dcount(SessionGUID_g),
    SessionFgAppCount = dcount(SessionFgAppId_s),
    HostCount =dcount(SessionFgBrowserActiveTabHost_s),
    AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent = round(avg(SessionCPUUsagePercent_d),1),
    AvgSessionIOPS = round(avg(SessionIOPS_d),1),
    AvgSessionWorkingSetMB = round(avg(SessionWorkingSetMB_d))
| union (
    uberAgent_Application_UIDelay_CL
    | where User_s ==  @"{User}"
    | summarize 
        SumUIDelayMs = sum(UIDelayMs_d)
    | project SumUIDelayS = round(SumUIDelayMs/1000)
)
| union (
    uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
    | where ProcUser_s ==  @"{User}"
    | summarize 
        NetTargetSendLatencyMs = avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)
    | project AvgSessionLatency = round(NetTargetSendLatencyMs/1000)
)
| union (
    uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL
    | where User_s ==  @"{User}"
    | summarize 
        LogonCount = dcount(SessionGUID_g),
        AvgTotalLogonTimeMs = avg(TotalLogonTimeMs_d)
    | project AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded = iif(isnull(AvgTotalLogonTimeMs) or isnan(AvgTotalLogonTimeMs), "n/a", tostring(round(AvgTotalLogonTimeMs / 1000, 2)))
)
| union (
    uberAgent_Application_Errors_CL
    | where ProcUser_s ==  @"{User}"
    | summarize 
        ErrorCount = count()
)
|summarize 
    User = @"{User}",
    take_any(SessionUser),
    take_any(SessionProtocols),
    take_any(SessionCount),
    take_any(SessionFgAppCount),
    take_any(HostCount),
    take_any(AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent),
    AvgSessionLatency = iff(take_any(AvgSessionLatency)==0,"n/a",tostring(take_any(AvgSessionLatency))),
    take_any(AvgSessionIOPS),
    take_any(AvgSessionWorkingSetMB),
    take_any(SumUIDelayS),
    take_any(AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded),
    take_any(ErrorCount)","size":3,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"SessionUser","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"SessionProtocols","formatter":5}],"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"SessionUser","label":"User"},{"columnId":"SessionCount","label":"#Sessions"},{"columnId":"SessionFgAppCount","label":"#Apps in foreground"},{"columnId":"HostCount","label":"#Hosts"},{"columnId":"AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent","label":"Avg. CPU"},{"columnId":"AvgSessionLatency","label":"Avg. net latency"},{"columnId":"AvgSessionIOPS","label":"Avg. disk"},{"columnId":"AvgSessionWorkingSetMB","label":"Avg. RAM"},{"columnId":"SumUIDelayS","label":"Total UI wait time"},{"columnId":"AvgTotalLogonTimeSRounded","label":"Avg. logon duration"},{"columnId":"ErrorCount","label":"App errors"}]},"tileSettings":{"showBorder":false,"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"SessionUser","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"SessionCount","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"},"numberFormat":{"unit":17,"options":{"maximumSignificantDigits":3,"maximumFractionDigits":2}}}}},"name":"query - 2"}]},"name":"group - Overview","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL
| where SessionUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Logon_LogonDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionGUID_g),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionID_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionProtocol_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionConnectionState_s),
    make_set(SessionClientName_s,10),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,TimeGenerated),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated, SessionLogonTime_s),
    AvgSessionProcessCount = avg(SessionProcessCount_d),
    AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent = avg(SessionCPUUsagePercent_d),
    AvgSessionIOPS = avg(SessionIOPS_d),
    AvgSessionWorkingSetMB = avg(SessionWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgSessionNetKBPS = avg(SessionNetKBPS_d),
    AvgSessionRpLatencyMs = avg(SessionRpLatencyMs2_d),
    AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs = avg(SessionRoundTripTimeMs_d),
    SumSessionIOCount = sum(SessionIOCount_d),
    TotalLogonTimeMs = sum(TotalLogonTimeMs_d)
by SessionGUID_g
|project 
SessionGUID = SessionGUID_g,
Host = Computer,
ID = SessionID_d,
["Logon time"] = SessionLogonTime_s,
["Logon duration (s)"] = round(TotalLogonTimeMs/1000,2),
["Last seen"] = TimeGenerated,
["Last state"] = SessionConnectionState_s,
["Protocol"] = SessionProtocol_s,
["Avg. #processes"] = round(AvgSessionProcessCount),
["Avg. CPU (%)"] =round( AvgSessionCPUUsagePercent,1),
["Avg. IOPS"] = round(AvgSessionIOPS,1),
["Avg. IO latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(round(AvgSessionRpLatencyMs/SumSessionIOCount,1)),'n/a',tostring(round(AvgSessionRpLatencyMs/SumSessionIOCount,1))),
["Avg. RAM (MB)"] = round(AvgSessionWorkingSetMB),
["Avg. network (KB/s)"] = round(AvgSessionNetKBPS,1),
["Avg. ICA latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs),'n/a',tostring(round(AvgSessionRoundTripTimeMs,1))),
["Remoting clients"] = set_SessionClientName_s
| sort by ['Logon time'] desc ","size":3,"title":"Sessions","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"filter":true}},"name":"query - 3"}]},"name":"group - sessions","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_CitrixSession_SessionConfig_CL
|where SessionUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmVolumes_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,DisplayMode_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireColorDepth_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireComponentEncoder_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireHardwareEncodeInUse_b),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireVideoCodecType_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireColorspace_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireVideoCodecUse_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkEdtMtu_d),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkConnectedVia_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterSessionPrinter_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwireActualPriority_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionUser_s),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
    arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionTransportProtocols_s)
by SessionUser_s
| project 
["Mapped volumes"] = replace_string(CdmVolumes_s, ";"," , "),
["Display mode" ] = DisplayMode_d,
["Thinwire color depth (bit)"] = ThinwireColorDepth_d,
["Thinwire component encoder"] = ThinwireComponentEncoder_s,
["Thinwire hardware encode"] = ThinwireHardwareEncodeInUse_b,
["Thinwire video codec type"] = ThinwireVideoCodecType_s,
["Thinwire color space"] = ThinwireColorspace_s,
["Thinwire video codec usage"] = ThinwireVideoCodecUse_s,
["EDT MTU"] = NetworkEdtMtu_d,
["Connected via"] = NetworkConnectedVia_s,
["Mapped printers"] = replace_string(PrinterSessionPrinter_s, ";"," , "),
["Audio channel actual priority"] = AudioActualPriority_s,
["CDM channel actual priority"] = CdmActualPriority_s,
["Printer channel actual priority"] = PrinterActualPriority_s,
["USB channel actual priority"] = USBActualPriority_s,
["Thinwire channel actual priority"] = ThinwireActualPriority_s,
["Transport protocols"] = SessionTransportProtocols_s,
User = SessionUser_s,
Host = Computer
| evaluate narrow()
| project Column, Value","size":3,"title":"Citrix settings (last seen values)","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"Column","label":"Setting"},{"columnId":"Value","label":"Value"}]}},"name":"query - 5"}]},"name":"group - Settings","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_CitrixSession_SessionConfig_CL
|where SessionUser_s == @"JVR4J\administrator"
| join kind=leftouter uberAgent_Session_SessionDetail_CL on SessionGUID_g
| summarize 
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyAllowMicrophoneRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyAllowRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,AudioPolicySoundQuality_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyAllowDriveRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyReadOnly_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,CdmPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyFps_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyUseHardwareEncoding_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyUseVideoCodec_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,ThinwirePolicyVisualQuality_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicyAcceptSessionReliabilityConnections_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityPort_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityTimeout_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,NetworkPolicyICAListenerPortNumber_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyAllowRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyAutoCreateClientPrinters_d),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,PrinterPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyAllowPNPRedirection_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyAllowUSBSupport_b),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,USBPolicyPriority_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionUser_s),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,Computer),
arg_max(TimeGenerated,SessionLogonTime_s)
by SessionUser_s
| project 
["Microphone redirection"]= AudioPolicyAllowMicrophoneRedirection_b,
["Audio redirection"]= AudioPolicyAllowRedirection_b,
["Audio channel priority"]= AudioPolicyPriority_s,
["Sound quality"]= AudioPolicySoundQuality_s,
["Client drive mapping"]= CdmPolicyAllowDriveRedirection_b,
["Read-only client drive access"]= CdmPolicyReadOnly_b,
["CDM channel priority"]= CdmPolicyPriority_s,
["Thinwire FPS"]= toint(ThinwirePolicyFps_d),
["Thinwire channel priority"]= ThinwirePolicyPriority_s,
["Thinwire hardware encoding"]= ThinwirePolicyUseHardwareEncoding_b,
["Thinwire video codec"]= ThinwirePolicyUseVideoCodec_s,
["Thinwire visual quality"]= ThinwirePolicyVisualQuality_s,
["Session reliability connections"]= NetworkPolicyAcceptSessionReliabilityConnections_b,
["Session reliability port"]= toint(NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityPort_d),
["Session reliability timeout (s)"]= toint(NetworkPolicySessionReliabilityTimeout_d),
["ICA listener port"]= toint(NetworkPolicyICAListenerPortNumber_d),
["Printer redirection"]= PrinterPolicyAllowRedirection_b,
["Printer channel priority"]= PrinterPolicyPriority_s,
["Auto-create client printers"]= toint(PrinterPolicyAutoCreateClientPrinters_d),
["USB PNP redirection"]= USBPolicyAllowPNPRedirection_b,
["USB support"]= USBPolicyAllowUSBSupport_b,
["USB channel priority"]= USBPolicyPriority_s,
["Logon time"]=SessionLogonTime_s,
User = SessionUser_s,
Host = Computer
| evaluate narrow()
| project Column, Value
| extend Value = case(Value == "true", "Allowed", Value == "false", "Disallowed", Value)","size":3,"title":"Citrix policies (last seen values)","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"labelSettings":[{"columnId":"Column","label":"Policy"},{"columnId":"Value","label":"Value"}]}},"name":"Citrix policies (last seen values)"}]},"name":"group - Policies","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"Network Data","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Send Volume (MB)"]=sum(NetTargetSendMB_d),
    ["Receive volume (MB)"]=sum(NetTargetReceiveMB_d)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Send Volume (MB)'], ["Receive volume (MB)"]","size":0,"title":"Network data - Send Volume over time","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"barchart","chartSettings":{"showMetrics":false,"showLegend":true}},"name":"query - 6"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg Send Latency"]=iff(isnan(avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)),0.0,avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d))
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ["Avg Send Latency"]","size":0,"aggregation":2,"title":"Network data - Average Send Latency","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"linechart","chartSettings":{"showMetrics":false,"showLegend":true}},"name":"query - 9"}]},"customWidth":"50","name":"group - 10","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","title":"CPU and RAM over time","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg. RAM (MB)"]=round(sum(ProcWorkingSetMB_d),1)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Avg. RAM (MB)']","size":0,"aggregation":3,"title":"RAM over time","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"barchart","chartSettings":{"showMetrics":false,"showLegend":true}},"name":"query - 10"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
| summarize 
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"]=round(sum(ProcCPUPercent_d),1)
    by TimeGenerated, period = bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| project period, ['Avg. CPU (%)']","size":0,"aggregation":3,"title":"CPU over time","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"linechart","chartSettings":{"showMetrics":false,"showLegend":true}},"name":"query - 7"}]},"customWidth":"50","name":"CPU and Memory","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let ProcDetails = uberAgent_Process_ProcessDetail_CL
| where ProcUser_s =~ @"{User}"
|  summarize
    processNames = make_set(ProcName_s,20),
    sum(ProcCPUPercent_d),
    sum(ProcIOPSRead_d),
    sum(ProcIOReadCount_d),
    sum(ProcWorkingSetMB_d),
    sum(ProcNetKBPS_d),
    sum(ProcIOLatencyReadMs2_d),
    sum(ProcIOLatencyWriteMs2_d)
    by AppId_s, TimeGenerated, Computer
| summarize 
    ["Process name(s)"]= make_set(processNames,20),
    AvgProcCPUPercent = avg(sum_ProcCPUPercent_d),
    AvgProcIOPS = avg(sum_ProcIOPSRead_d),
    SumProcIOCount = sum(sum_ProcIOReadCount_d),
    AvgProcWorkingSetMB = sum(sum_ProcWorkingSetMB_d),
    AvgProcNetKBPS = avg(sum_ProcNetKBPS_d)
    by AppId_s;



let uiDelayDetails = uberAgent_Application_UIDelay_CL
| where User_s == @"{User}"
| summarize
    UIDelayMs = sum(UIDelayMs_d)
    by AppId_s;

let latencyDetails = uberAgent_Process_NetworkTargetPerformance_CL
| where ProcUser_s == @"{User}"
| summarize
    Latency = avg(NetTargetSendLatencyMs_d)
    by AppId_s;



ProcDetails
| join kind=leftouter uiDelayDetails on AppId_s
| join kind=leftouter latencyDetails on AppId_s
| project
    ["App Name"] = AppId_s,
    ["Process name(s)"] = tostring(["Process name(s)"]),
    ["Avg. CPU (%)"] = round(AvgProcCPUPercent, 1),
    ["Avg. IOPS"] = round (AvgProcIOPS,1),
    ["Avg. RAM (MB)"] = round(AvgProcWorkingSetMB, 0),
    ["Avg. net thruput (KB/s)"] = round (AvgProcNetKBPS,1),
    ["Avg. net latency (ms)"] = iff(isnan(round(Latency,1)),"n/a",tostring(round(Latency,1))),
    ["UI unresponsiveness (s)"] = round(UIDelayMs/1000,1)
| sort by tolower(["App Name"]) asc;
","size":0,"title":"Applications","timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"Process name(s)","formatter":0,"formatOptions":{"customColumnWidthSetting":"87.7143ch"}}]}},"name":"query - 8"}]},"name":"group - Processes","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}}],"isLocked":false,"fallbackResourceIds":["/subscriptions/6acb58f7-163b-48ff-b133-8c258b4f14da/resourceGroups/KRS-RG1/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/uberAgentWS"]}
